jd: From: Muskan, infotech muskan.sharma@infotechspectrum.com Reply to: muskan.sharma@infotechspectrum.com Hi,Python Lead/Full-Stack Tech Lead (15 years experience needed)RemoteUSC/GC/GCEAD/H4EAD Primary SkillsPython,React,JavaScript,Fast APIScope of Work:Assist in building and enhancing Pantheon, a new API/platform designed to enable developers and engineers to create and manage ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) flows.Accenture level 8Exp- 15+Tech Stack:Backend Development:Python: For server-side logic and API development.FastAPI: For building high-performance APIs.AWS: Including Lambdas for serverless computing and Step Functions for workflow orchestration.Frontend Development:React: For creating dynamic user interfaces.JavaScript: For client-side scripting and enhancing UI interactions.Deployment and Operations:Blue-Green Traffic Switches: Implementing to reduce downtime and risks during deployment.Canary QA and Production Deployments: Gradually rolling out features and updates.Testing:Unit Testing: Writing and maintaining tests to ensure component functionality.Acceptance Test-Driven Development (ATDD): Validating that features meet business requirements through predefined tests. Additional Notes:Candidates should ideally have experience in both front-end and back-end development Thank YouBest RegardsMuskan SharmaInfoTech Spectrum Inc2060, Walsh Ave, #120, Santa Clara, CA 95050Email : muskan.sharma@infotechspectrum.com Web: www.infotechspectrum.com
